#/usr/bin/python

import os
import sys
import math

l = sys.stdin.readlines()
N = int(l[0])
l.remove(l[0])
x = map(int, l)

for i in range(len(x)):
	n = x[i]
	if n>0:
		ans = math.factorial(2*n-2)/(math.factorial(n-1)*math.factorial(n-1))
		ans = ans/n
	else:
		ans = 0
	ans = ans%10000
	print ans
